name: Beach Angel, Marielle
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top three cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a climax, put this card into your stock.
flavorText: It's summer in the Elder Tales world! And summer is all about the beach.

name: Assassin, Akatsuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character. 【ACT】 [【REST】 one of your characters] This card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Thanks for that! Going in! One more hit…… and we're done with this!

name: Lord's Ninja, Akatsuki
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When?this?card?attacks, if a card named "Waltz for Two" is in your climax area, until end of turn, this card gets +4000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may deal one damage to your opponent."(This damage may be canceled)
flavorText: So my…… My Lord…… do you have plans for the festival?

name: Crescent Moon Alliance, Serara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I need to look after all the new players we have, now, so…… Um……

name: Isuzu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: I'm Isuzu and I am a bard class.

name: Dislikes Fashion? Akatsuki
text: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】) 【ACT】 [【REST】 one of your 《Magic》 characters] This card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Look I-I am My Lord's personal ninja! I can’t wear such frilly things!

name: Adventurer, Rundellhaus
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】 from your opponent character's 【AUTO】 effects.
flavorText: I am, Rundellhaus Kode! The Adventurer―――!

name: Serara
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 When another of your characters becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm a level nineteen druid, and my subclass is maid.

name: Maiden's Heart, Akatsuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 character, put it into your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place.) 【AUTO】 Change [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Lord's Ninja, Akatsuki" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Hey, it's gonna fall off.

name: Rudy's Owner? Isuzu
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters with "Rundellhaus(ルンデルハウス)" in its card name get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: He really is amazing…… But he's a dog.

name: Waltz for Two, Akatsuki
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have any other characters, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］".
flavorText: Weird? Really? I'm trying better…… I am.

name: Henrietta
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you do not have any other 《Magic》 characters, put this card into your waiting room.
flavorText: When it come to planning, nothing's too complicated for the amazing, masterful mind of Dark Shiro.

name: Reliable Accountant, Henrietta
text: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Cleric, Marielle" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Cleric, Marielle" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Maybe, but she looks like she needs someone to throw her a life preserver……

name: Silent Worker, Akatsuki
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards in your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Milord, may I inflict great pain upon Naotsugu's face?

name: Sorcerer, Rundellhaus
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters. 【AUTO】 [(3) Put two cards from your hand into your waiting room] When?this?card?attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal five damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Let's do this, a little more elegantly this time!

name: Rundellhaus
text: 【AUTO】 Change [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Adventurer, Rundellhaus" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: My graceful yet devastating techniques will annihilate our enemy. All you have to do is stand back and support me, okay?

name: Loves Nyan-ta, Serara
flavorText: Wait a second, this isn't really so much like a maid…… This is more like…… being a housewife……?

name: Crescent Moon Shopowner, Marielle
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Why, we oughta have that five million gold in no time if we keep doing this business……

name: Shoryu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another character with "Marielle(マリエール)" in its card name, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Miss Marielle…… is this…… gonna help the kitchen any?

name: Petit Akatsuki
flavorText: Do not call me "pip squeak"!

name: Cleric, Marielle
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card attacks, if a card named "Crescent Moon Alliance" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to two characters in your waiting room, return them to your hand, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: At a time like this, the more people on your side, the better!

name: Bard, Isuzu
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］".
flavorText: Come on. It wasn't worth any applause, was it?

name: Dolled Up Akatsuki
text: Choose up to two characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand.
flavorText: Henrietta: "Ah…… My exhaustion is flying away……"

name: Waltz for Two
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText:
Akatsuki: "Milord, I'm really not that good…… I'm kinda clumsy."
Shiroe: "I saw you practicing."

name: Crescent Moon Alliance
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: You're okay, right……!? I-I'm like so glad, you made it back from Susukino sweetie～…

name: Nyan-ta
text: 【AUTO】 When another of your 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's characters, STAND@ that card and move it to another open position on your opponent's stage, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Show me a cat-man who doesn't talk like this and I'll set him straight, hmmmm.

name: Field Monitor, Minori
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When a card named "Simplified Full Control Encounter" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, all of your other characters get +2500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character on the bottom of your opponent's deck."
flavorText: If I'm too scared to say it, nothing will change…… I've gotta say something!

name: Log Horizon's Representative, Shiroe
text: 【CONT】 You cannot take damage from your opponent character's 【AUTO】 effects. 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] During your turn, when another of your character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card is STAND@, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -2 soul."
flavorText: ……If you can't help them both, then don't. Focus on what you can, it'll help.

name: Full Control Encounter, Shiroe
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +1000 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, draw up to one card.
flavorText: Naotsugu: "If I were to hazard a guess, I'd say he was fighting by looking thirty seconds ahead."

name: Waltz for Two, Shiroe
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is four or more, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Care to dance?

name: Log Horizon, Nyan-ta
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When another of your characters is being frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your 《Magic》 characters] Until end of turn, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking.
flavorText: This is what I call a time to shine.

name: Determination to Change the World, Shiroe
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] When your other character attacks, if a card named "Log Horizon" is in your climax area, and this card is STAND@, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, that character gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw a card." 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Give me your assistance. Help me, and my guild.

name: Reliable Buddy, Naotsugu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, your opponent may draw a card. If your opponent does, your opponent chooses a card from your opponent's hand, and puts it into his or her waiting room.
flavorText: I've been watching you lately, man. And you need to lighten up some.

name: Guardian, Naotsugu
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters. 【CONT】 Great Performance (When your opponent attacks, if this card is in the middle position of your center stage and not 【REVERSE】, your opponent frontal attacks this card instead)
flavorText: ……Toya, the job of a front-line tank is to absorb all the enemy hits, and to trust his companions to back him up when he needs it.

name: Guildmaster, Shiroe
text: 【AUTO】 Bond/ "Reliable Buddy, Naotsugu" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Reliable Buddy, Naotsugu" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand) 【ACT】 [(1)] Draw a card, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: And instead of losing your patience, you waited for me to figure it out just like that?

name: Rayneshia
text: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When another of your characters is put into the waiting room from the stage, if this card is on the back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】. 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Well a real gentleman wouldn't say something like that.

name: Sojiro
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, if the number of characters your opponent has is three or less, this card gets +2000 power.
flavorText: Master Shiro, Master Nyan-ta, it's been quite a while.

name: Everyone's Group Leader, Nyan-ta
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if the number of other 《Weapon》or 《Magic》 characters you have is one or less, put this card into your clock.
flavorText: It's everyone's favorite, curry, myah.

name: Krusty
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +1000 power.
flavorText: You have to want it and work for it.

name: Minori
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Samurai, Toya" and "Toya" get +1000 power. 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters get +1000 power.
flavorText: We know we're not as strong as the rest of you are but we really wanna learn……

name: Maiden's Heart, Minori
text: 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Choose one of your 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Say Ahhh!

name: Petit Naotsugu
text: 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] This card gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: I really need you to tell me before you do it next time!

name: Samurai, Toya
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage with a character facing this card.
flavorText: I didn’t forget, Master Naotsugu!

name: Toya
text: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Minori(ミノリ)" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power. 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, if this card is on your center stage and not 【REVERSE】, all of your other characters get +1000 power.
flavorText: If you've made a guild, we want to be in it.

name: Petit Shiroe
flavorText: All of a sudden…… there I was.

name: Scribe, Shiroe
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +3000 power.
flavorText: I don't know what effect this magic will have on this world.

name: Isaac
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do not, put this card into your waiting room.
flavorText: You and your guild obviously put this thing together, so let's go over every little detail and work it all out.

name: Mind Shock
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of your 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters, and that character gets +3500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: It's a little risky, but we don’t have a choice.

name: Log Horizon
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose a climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.) (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Yeah, that's right, a name……

name: Simplified Full Control Encounter
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may draw a card.) (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: Naotsugu: "All these facts she's tracking has her fighting just like Shiro!"

name: Holding Hands, Akatsuki
text: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Shiroe" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power. 【CONT】 When another of your 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Holding Hands, Shiroe
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 [REST this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level.

name: Student of the Mage, Minori
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a character with "Shiroe" in its card name, choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)

name: Druid, Serara
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
flavorText: Come on! You gotta get healthy faster than that!

name: Akatsuki
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a marker from underneath this card into your waiting room] When?this?card?attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 0 or lower characters in the center stage, and put it into your opponent's waiting room. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If there are no markers underneath this card, put the top card of your deck underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Then from this moment on I shall revere you as my Lord, as your ninja.

name: Marielle Using Telepathy
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Hi, Shiro! Where are you?

name: Revealed Beauty, Akatsuki
flavorText: Naotsugu: "Aw-yeah! S’up, girl. Babe city, seriously."

name: Embarassed Akatsuki
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Weapon》 or 《Magic》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1500 power.
flavorText: Me, too... I mean... Uh ? um thank you.

name: Crescent Moon Alliance Accountant, Henrietta
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Marielle, stop it.

name: Crescent Moon Alliance Representative, Marielle
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose one of your 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Shiro, did you get a girlfriend and not tell me about her?

name: Furious Akatsuki
flavorText: Uh, Milord? Don’t tell me that you were also thinking I was just a kid in middle school.

name: Assassination
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: Assassination!

name: Chef, Nyan-ta
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: I have mastered the gentlemanly art of being a chef.

name: Shiroe Riding a Gryphon
flavorText: Okay, hang on tight.

name: Swashbuckler, Nyan-ta
text: 【AUTO】 When a card named "Sophisticated Cooperation" is placed on your climax area, if you have another character with "Shiroe(シロエ)" in its card name, this card gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: You ready to get all scratched up?

name: First Battle, Naotsugu
flavorText: I lose my Level 90, it’s your ass! Shield Swing!

name: Composed Expression, Shiroe
text: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.)
flavorText: That is…… If they can beat us.

name: Shiroe
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw a card.
flavorText: Because it’s not. This is...Our new reality!

name: Naotsugu
text: 【ACT】 [【REST】 one of your 《Magic》 characters] This card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm Naotsugu, a Guardian. I’ve got a thing for the ladies and I’m not ashamed to admit…!

name: Enchanter, Shiroe
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is five or more, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play "Backup" from hand." 【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText: A mage that is able to cast spells is an Enchanter. It’s one of the classes that uses offensive magic. But its attack power is... weak!

name: Enchanter's Support
text: Choose one of your opponent's level 3 or lower characters. That character cannot STAND@ during your opponent's next stand phase. Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Add a confusion debuff that lowers accuracy and agility. Next... Amplify the attack power of your allies' weapons…!

name: Sophisticated Cooperation
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: "Ready Shiroecchi?" "Absolutely. Ready when you are, Chief."

name: First Spoils of Victory
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one blue card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: We’re the first ones to make it here... Seriously... We’re the first adventurers to actually live this.
